## Sign up for Dropbox

Go to <https://www.dropbox.com/>

Fill in your name, email address, and password.

Click "Sign up for free".

### Optional:

- Download and install the Dropbox app for your computer.

## Sign up for Mendeley

Go to <http://mendeley.com/>

Click "Create a free account", and follow the prompts.

### Optional:

- Download and install Mendeley Desktop from <https://www.mendeley.com/download-mendeley-desktop/>
- Install the Mendeley Web Importer for Google Chrome from <https://www.mendeley.com/import/>
